title: Finding the right shoes for the Boston Marathon isn't always easy
author: Jon Chesto, Keith Bedford
description: One of running’s greatest beauties is its simplicity. No special equipment needed, aside from the shoes on your feet. But for serious runners, picking the right pair of shoes isn’t quite so simple.
